member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams.GetClearTypeLevel
member.summary: Gets the ClearType level of the rendering parameters object.
member.returns: The ClearType level of the rendering parameters object.

member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams.GetEnhancedContrast
member.summary: Gets the enhanced contrast property of the rendering parameters object. Valid values are greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: Returns the amount of contrast enhancement. Valid values are greater than or equal to zero.

member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams.GetGamma
member.summary: Gets the gamma value used for gamma correction. Valid values must be greater than zero and cannot exceed 256.
member.returns: Returns the gamma value used for gamma correction. Valid values must be greater than zero and cannot exceed 256.

member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams.GetPixelGeometry
member.summary: Gets the pixel geometry of the rendering parameters object.
member.returns: A value that indicates the type of pixel geometry used in the rendering parameters object.

member.name: IDWriteRenderingParams.GetRenderingMode
member.summary: Gets the rendering mode of the rendering parameters object.
member.returns: A value that indicates the rendering mode of the rendering parameters object.

summary.para: Represents text rendering settings such as ClearType level, enhanced contrast, and gamma correction for glyph rasterization and filtering.
An application typically obtains a rendering parameters object by calling the method.
